items.title: 报告：蒂姆·库克最早将于明年卸任苹果CEO (原标题: Report: Tim Cook to Step Down as Apple CEO 'as Soon as Next Year')
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## 蒂姆·库克可能最早于明年卸任苹果CEO

根据《金融时报》的报道，苹果公司正在为现任CEO蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）最早于明年卸任做准备。公司董事会和高级管理人员“最近加紧了库克交接权力的准备工作”。

### 潜在的卸任时间表

*   报告指出，苹果不太可能在明年1月下旬的下一次财报发布前任命新的CEO。
*   然而，如果能在年初宣布，将有助于在6月的年度开发者大会（WWDC）和9月的iPhone发布会之前实现平稳的领导层过渡。
*   目前尚未做出最终决定，并且时间安排仍可能发生变化。

### 蒂姆·库克背景

*   库克自2011年8月起担任苹果CEO。
*   他今年65岁，这在美国是一个常见的退休年龄，但他尚未公开宣布任何卸任计划。

![蒂姆·库克 WWDC 2018](https://images.macrumors.com/t/sDx3g6QgUYvAjObt091_94aRFNE=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/Tim-Cook-WWDC-2018.jpg?lossy)

### 潜在继任者

*   苹果硬件工程高级副总裁约翰·特纳斯（John Ternus）被广泛认为是库克最有可能的继任者。
*   特纳斯于2001年加入苹果，现年50岁，是苹果较年轻的高级管理人员之一，因此他有可能长期担任CEO。

![苹果约翰·特纳斯 2019](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-3dCShmfyac1GUd6-EViC1xDqWk=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/Apple-John-Ternus-2019.jpg?lossy)

### 不同观点与公司业绩

*   彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）对该报道提出异议，表示他“不认为（卸任）是《金融时报》所声称的那样迫在眉睫”。
*   报告强调，苹果的继任计划与公司目前的业绩无关。苹果在9月季度报告了创纪录的收入，并预计当前的12月季度将是公司历史上最好的季度。此外，苹果的股价也接近历史最高点。
items.shortSummary: 据《金融时报》报道，苹果公司正准备让蒂姆·库克最早于明年卸任CEO，董事会已加紧准备。库克自2011年起担任CEO，今年65岁。硬件工程高级副总裁约翰·特纳斯被视为最可能的继任者。尽管彭博社的马克·古尔曼对此表示怀疑，但报告指出，此举与苹果当前强劲的业绩无关，公司收入和股价均表现出色。
items.translated_title: 报告：蒂姆·库克最早将于明年卸任苹果CEO
items.content:
Apple is preparing for Tim Cook to step down as CEO of the company "as soon as next year," according to the Financial Times.


The company's board of directors and senior executives "recently intensified preparations for Cook to hand over the reins," the report said.

While the report said that Apple is unlikely to name a new CEO before its next earnings report in late January, it went on to explain that an announcement early in the year would allow for a smooth leadership transition, ahead of Apple's annual developers conference WWDC in June and iPhone event in September.

No final decisions have been made, and the timing could change, the report said.

Cook has been Apple's CEO since August 2011. He turned 65 this year, which is a common age for retirement in the United States, but he has yet to publicly announce any plans to step down. Apple's Senior Vice President of Hardware Engineering, John Ternus, is widely viewed as Cook's most likely successor when the time comes.


Ternus joined Apple in 2001. At 50, he is one of Apple's younger senior executives, so he could potentially have a lengthy run as CEO.

Bloomberg's Mark Gurman pushed back on the report. "I don't get the sense anything is imminent as the [Financial Times] is claiming," he said, in a post today.

In any case, the report said Apple's succession plans are not related to the company's current performance. Apple reported record revenue in the September quarter, and the company expects the current December quarter to be the best quarter in the company's history. In addition, Apple's stock price is near its all-time high.
Tags: Financial Times, Tim Cook

items.title: 苹果失去一位高级主管，杰夫·威廉姆斯正式退休 (原标题: Apple Loses a Top Executive as Jeff Williams Officially Retires)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果高级主管杰夫·威廉姆斯正式退休

苹果公司资深高管杰夫·威廉姆斯（Jeff Williams）在为公司服务超过25年后，已于2025年11月14日星期五正式退休。他的离职标志着苹果领导层的一次重要变动。

![Apple Event Jeff Williams](https://images.macrumors.com/t/XCp6bovcds4LL8Kk7GNumhmAcU0=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/Apple-Event-Jeff-Williams.jpg?lossy)

### 职业生涯回顾

*   **加入苹果：** 威廉姆斯于1998年加入苹果公司。
*   **晋升COO：** 2015年，他被提升为首席运营官（COO），负责监督苹果全球的运营、客户服务和支持长达十年。
*   **职位变动：**
    *   今年7月，萨比赫·汗（Sabih Khan）接替他担任COO一职。
    *   作为一项计划中的过渡，威廉姆斯此后一直担任设计、Apple Watch和健康业务的高级副总裁，直至本周五正式退休。
*   **核心贡献：**
    *   他领导了Apple Watch的工程和健康计划。
    *   自2023年起，他还接管了苹果的设计团队。

### 离职的重要性

杰夫·威廉姆斯是苹果公司的顶级高管之一，他的离职备受关注。他曾一度被认为是潜在的首席执行官（CEO）候选人。

### 退休感言与评价

*   **杰夫·威廉姆斯（7月）：**
    *   表达了对苹果深厚的爱，并表示能与公司里杰出的人才共事是其一生的荣幸。
    *   感谢蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）提供的机会、鼓舞人心的领导以及多年来的友谊。
    *   他表示，今年6月是他加入苹果的第27个年头，也是他从事该行业的第40个年头。
    *   计划从明年开始，花更多时间陪伴朋友和家人，包括五个孙辈。
    *   对继任者萨比赫·汗充满信心，称其为“地球上最有才华的运营主管”。
*   **蒂姆·库克（7月）：**
    *   表示威廉姆斯对苹果的贡献不可或缺。
    *   赞扬他建立了全球最受尊敬的供应链之一。
    *   肯定他推出了Apple Watch并监督其发展，构建了苹果的健康战略，并以智慧、热情和奉献精神领导了世界一流的设计团队。
    *   对威廉姆斯多年来对苹果的无数贡献和忠诚的友谊表示由衷的感激。
    *   指出威廉姆斯的真正遗产体现在他所创建的杰出团队中，并相信他将未来的工作交到了“不可思议的手中”。

苹果公司祝愿威廉姆斯退休生活一切顺利。

items.translated_title: 苹果失去一位高级主管，杰夫·威廉姆斯正式退休
items.content:
Apple executive Jeff Williams has retired, after working at the company for more than 25 years.


Apple removed Williams from its leadership page on Friday, which was his final day, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.

Williams joined Apple in 1998, and was promoted to Chief Operations Officer (COO) in 2015. He held the role until July of this year, when he was succeeded by Sabih Khan, who was previously Apple's Senior Vice President of Operations.

As part of a planned transition, Williams remained at Apple as Senior Vice President of Design, Watch, and Health until this Friday.

For a decade, Williams oversaw Apple's entire worldwide operations, as well as customer service and support. He also led Apple Watch engineering and health initiatives at the company, and he took over Apple's design team in 2023.

Williams was one of the top executives at Apple, so his departure is very notable. At one point, he was even considered a potential candidate for CEO.

Here is what Williams said about his retirement plans back in July:
I have a deep love for Apple. Working with all of the amazing people at this company has been a privilege of a lifetime, and I can't thank Tim enough for the opportunity, his inspirational leadership, and our friendship over the years. June marked my 27th anniversary with Apple, and my 40th in the industry. Beginning next year, I plan to spend more time with friends and family, including five grandchildren and counting. I've had the pleasure of working closely with Sabih for 27 years and I think he's the most talented operations executive on the planet. I have tremendous confidence in Apple's future under his leadership in this role.
Apple CEO Tim Cook, in July:
Jeff and I have worked alongside each other for as long as I can remember, and Apple wouldn't be what it is without him. He's helped to create one of the most respected global supply chains in the world; launched Apple Watch and overseen its development; architected Apple's health strategy; and led our world class team of designers with great wisdom, heart, and dedication. I am and will always be beyond grateful for his numerous contributions to Apple over the years and his loyal friendship. Jeff's true legacy can be seen in the amazing team he's created and, while he'll be greatly missed, he leaves the work of the future in incredible hands.
We wish Williams all the best in retirement.
Tag: Jeff Williams

items.title: 苹果因Apple Watch血氧专利诉讼被判赔偿6.34亿美元 (原标题: Apple Hit With $634 Million Verdict in Apple Watch Blood Oxygen Patent Lawsuit)
items.creator: Eric Slivka
items.summary:
# 苹果Apple Watch血氧专利诉讼判决

美国联邦陪审团裁定，苹果公司因其Apple Watch的血氧传感技术侵犯医疗技术公司Masimo的专利，需向Masimo支付6.34亿美元的赔偿金。苹果公司已表示将对该判决提起上诉。

## 案件背景与判决详情

*   **陪审团裁决**：美国联邦陪审团认定苹果侵犯了Masimo的专利，判决赔偿6.34亿美元。
*   **苹果的回应**：苹果公司计划对这一裁决提出上诉。
*   **Masimo的声明**：Masimo对判决结果表示满意，并认为这是其在保护创新和知识产权方面持续努力的重大胜利，这对其开发有益于患者的技术至关重要。
*   **苹果的反驳**：苹果发言人指出，在过去六年里，Masimo曾多次在不同法院起诉苹果，并主张了超过25项专利，其中大部分已被认定无效。苹果还强调，本案涉及的单一专利已于2022年到期，且与几十年前的历史患者监测技术相关。

## 销售禁令与苹果的应对措施

*   **初期禁令**：此专利纠纷导致美国于2023年12月禁止销售带有血氧功能的Apple Watch。
*   **禁令恢复与软件禁用**：尽管苹果在上诉期间曾获得临时中止令，但禁令于2024年1月18日恢复。苹果随即通过软件禁用该功能的方式，重新推出了Apple Watch的销售。
*   **功能受限**：在超过一年半的时间里，美国市场的Apple Watch型号无法支持血氧监测功能。
*   **苹果的解决方案**：2025年8月，苹果推出了一项新的解决方案，即血氧数据在配对的iPhone上进行处理和显示，而非直接在Apple Watch本身上。这一改变获得了负责执行原禁令的美国海关监管机构的认可。
*   **Masimo的进一步诉讼**：Masimo对苹果的这一“变通方案”并不满意，已提起另一起诉讼，试图推翻美国海关的决定，并再次阻止苹果在美国销售带有血氧功能的Apple Watch型号。目前，该诉讼尚未有裁决。

![Apple Watch Series 6 血氧监测](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FaW95yCo3OnqZLXNo2GD5BJ7VQ8=/400x0/article-new/2020/09/apple-watch-series-6-blood-oxygen-monitoring-1.jpg?lossy)

items.content:
A U.S. federal jury has ruled that Apple owes medical technology company Masimo $634 million for patent infringement related to the blood oxygen-sensing technology in the Apple Watch, reports Reuters. Apple will appeal the verdict.


"We are pleased by this outcome, and appreciate the time and attention given to our case by the court and the jury," said Masimo in a press release." This is a significant win in our ongoing efforts to protect our innovations and intellectual property, which is crucial to our ability to develop technology that benefits patients. We remain committed to defending our IP rights moving forward."

"Over the past six years (Masimo has) sued Apple in multiple courts and asserted over 25 patents, the majority of which have been found to be invalid," an Apple spokesperson told Reuters. "The single patent in this case expired in 2022, and is specific to historic patient monitoring technology from decades ago."

The patent dispute led to a ban on U.S. sales of Apple Watch with the blood oxygen feature in December 2023. Apple was able to temporarily continue selling the Apple Watch models while an interim stay was in place during an appeal, but the ban was reinstated as of January 18, 2024, and Apple addressed the issue by immediately launching sales of models with the feature disabled in software.

Apple Watch models in the U.S. remained unable to support blood oxygen monitoring for over a year and a half before Apple introduced a workaround in August 2025 with blood oxygen data being processed and displayed on a paired iPhone rather than on the Apple Watch itself, a change that satisfied U.S. Customs regulators that had been charged with enforcing the original ban.

Apple's workaround did not sit well with Masimo, which filed another lawsuit in an attempt to overturn the U.S. Customs decision and once again prevent Apple from selling Apple Watch models with the blood oxygen feature in the U.S., but there has yet to be a ruling in that lawsuit.
Tag: Masimo

items.title: 头条新闻：Apple Silicon 五周年，iPhone Pocket，以及更多 (原标题: Top Stories: Apple Silicon Turns 5, iPhone Pocket, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
# 本周头条：Apple Silicon 五周年，iPhone Pocket，以及更多

本周，科技界迎来了多项重要更新和消息，包括Apple Silicon Mac芯片的五周年里程碑、一款令人惊讶的iPhone配件发布、iPhone Air销售不佳导致的延迟，以及iOS和Wallet应用的新功能。

![本周头条 2025 11 15](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vnUUMgd1MLN1-yU0xVI9gbLl7bw=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/top-stories-2025-11-15.jpg?lossy)

## Apple Silicon 五周年：从 M1 到 M5 的性能演进
本周标志着Apple Silicon芯片取代Mac产品线中Intel芯片的五周年。

*   **M1 芯片发布**：首款Apple Silicon芯片M1于2020年11月10日发布，首次应用于MacBook Air、Mac mini和13英寸MacBook Pro。
*   **性能卓越**：M1芯片以其“全球最快的CPU核心”和行业领先的每瓦性能令人印象深刻。
*   **持续发展**：至今已推出五代Apple Silicon芯片，最新的M5芯片于上月在14英寸MacBook Pro中亮相。

![M1 芯片幻灯片](https://images.macrumors.com/t/66vlaAyGBaUZWRNgAOKX4ksOHWA=/400x0/article-new/2020/11/m1-chip-slide.jpg?lossy)

## Apple 推出 iPhone Pocket：限量版配件
Apple发布了一款名为iPhone Pocket的特别版针织配件，类似于可伸缩的口袋或袜子，可用于存放iPhone、AirPods或其他日常物品。

*   **设计与合作**：这款配件由Apple与日本时尚品牌ISSEY MIYAKE合作推出，其创始人曾设计史蒂夫·乔布斯标志性的黑色高领毛衣。
*   **款式与价格**：提供多种鲜艳颜色，有短肩带（149.95美元）和长肩带（229.95美元）两种选择。
*   **市场反响**：该产品在美国上市后几乎立即售罄。

![iPhone Pocket](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0AN6KYWLuArxN1ysnfTbGCH4g-U=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/iphone-pocket%402x-1.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone Air 销量不佳，下一代版本被推迟
据报道，轻薄的iPhone Air销量不佳，导致Apple决定推迟原定于2026年秋季与iPhone 18 Pro和可折叠iPhone一同发布的下一代版本。

*   **延迟原因**：销量不佳是主要原因。
*   **改进计划**：Apple并未取消该产品，正在寻求改进方法，例如增加第二个后置摄像头以提升吸引力。
*   **发布时间调整**：改进后的版本可能于2027年春季与常规iPhone 18和iPhone 18e一同发布，Apple或将旗舰iPhone的发布时间分散至全年。
*   **其他产品**：iPhone 16e也因其599美元的价格（相较于iPhone SE前代大幅上涨）被认为“失败”，但目前没有关于其后续型号iPhone 17e（传闻2026年春季发布）延迟的报道。

![iPhone Air 摄像头](https://images.macrumors.com/t/drIt4EmrTpOOw6s_b2el3ddVxbY=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/iphone-air-camera.jpg?lossy)

## HomePod mini、Apple TV 和 AirTag 更新迟迟未至
尽管此前有传闻称HomePod mini、Apple TV和AirTag的更新将在2025年中或年末发布，但随着时间推移，这些更新的可能性越来越小。

*   **库存状况**：HomePod mini在许多第三方零售商处库存告急，但当前型号仍被Apple列为热门礼品。
*   **可能原因**：HomePod mini和Apple TV的延迟可能与Apple改进Siri以及扩展智能家居平台（包括新的家庭中枢设备和摄像头）的持续延迟有关。
*   **AirTag 状况**：目前尚不清楚是什么原因导致具有更大范围和其他改进的第二代AirTag迟迟未能发布。

![HomePod mini 特色缩略图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/cwXy-5-vKUsTKXYBTJg0fHh_96M=/400x0/article-new/2020/11/homepod-mini-thumb-feature.jpg?lossy)

## iOS 26.2 Beta 2 的新功能
Apple向开发者发布了iOS 26.2的第二个测试版，带来了一些新功能。

*   **Measure 应用**：测量应用新增“液态玻璃”外观。
*   **CarPlay 消息应用**：在CarPlay中，用户可以选择关闭消息应用中的置顶对话。
*   **其他改进**：动画和游戏应用得到改进。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9gZqzwr4izpakGd18cqwpi88XnM=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/iOS-26.2-Glass-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## Apple 在 iPhone 上推出美国护照数字身份功能
Apple宣布，iPhone用户现在可以在Apple Wallet应用中根据其美国护照信息创建数字身份（Digital ID）。

*   **主要用途**：该数字身份可用于在美国250多个机场的TSA检查站进行国内航空旅行。
*   **未来扩展**：未来，它还将用于在特定商店、兼容应用和支持网站上提供身份和年龄验证。
*   **局限性**：数字身份不能完全取代实体护照，不能用于国际旅行和边境检查。

![iOS 26 数字身份护照钱包](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CuE5W7QebYo5UlOpZ8VTaOenlZ4=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-digital-id-passport-wallet.jpg?lossy)

## 其他值得关注的消息

*   **AirPods 固件更新**：Apple发布了适用于AirPods Pro 2、AirPods Pro 3和AirPods 4的新固件，具体更新内容未公布。
*   **iOS 26.2 正式版**：iOS 26.2预计将于下月（12月）向所有用户发布，将包含锁定屏幕时钟的“液态玻璃”滑块、Apple Music离线歌词等功能。
*   **tvOS 26.2 新功能**：Apple TV上的额外配置文件不再需要单独的Apple账户。
*   **Tesla 支持 CarPlay**：据报道，Tesla正在努力为其车辆添加Apple CarPlay支持。
*   **Apple Intelligence 兼容性**：Apple已更正其Apple Intelligence设备兼容性列表，确认支持M1 Mac。
items.shortSummary: 本周Apple新闻亮点：Apple Silicon迎来五周年，M1到M5芯片性能持续提升。Apple推出限量版iPhone Pocket配件，迅速售罄。iPhone Air因销量不佳，下一代版本被推迟。HomePod mini、Apple TV和AirTag的更新仍未发布。iOS 26.2 Beta 2带来新功能，包括Measure应用改进和CarPlay设置。Apple还在iPhone Wallet应用中推出了美国护照数字身份功能，用于国内旅行和身份验证。
items.translated_title: 头条新闻：Apple Silicon 五周年，iPhone Pocket，以及更多
items.content:
It's hard to believe we're halfway through November already, as 2025 rapidly draws to a close with no firm signs of several smaller hardware updates we've been hoping to see before the end of the year, although we did get one surprising new iPhone accessory this week.


This week also saw the fifth anniversary of the very successful Apple silicon effort on the Mac, contrasted with the future of the iPhone Air seeming shakier than ever. On the software side, Apple made some more tweaks with the second beta of iOS 26.2 and released the Digital ID feature to allow users to add their U.S. passports to the Wallet app, so read on below for all the details!

Top Stories


Five Years of Apple Silicon: M1 to M5 Performance Comparison


This week marked the fifth anniversary of the Apple silicon chip that replaced Intel chips in Apple's Mac lineup. The first Apple silicon chip, the M1, was unveiled on November 10, 2020, and it debuted in the MacBook Air, Mac mini, and 13-inch MacBook Pro.


The ‌M1‌ chip was impressive when it launched, featuring the "world's fastest CPU core" and industry-leading performance per watt, and it's only improved since then. We've had five total generations of Apple silicon chips, with the M5 unveiled in the 14-inch ‌MacBook Pro‌ just last month, so check out our look at how Apple's latest M-series chip compares to the first one.

Apple Debuts iPhone Pocket, a Limited Edition iPod Sock-Style Accessory


While Apple branched out into the crossbody strap accessory market with the iPhone 17 lineup, the company has now gone a step further with the release of the special-edition iPhone Pocket, a knitted accessory much like a stretchy pocket or sock that can hold an iPhone, AirPods, or other everyday items.


Available in a number of vibrant color options, the iPhone Pocket comes in both short strap ($149.95) and long strap ($229.95) options, although it almost immediately sold out in the United States upon launch. The iPhone Pocket was created in a partnership between Apple and Japanese fashion house ISSEY MIYAKE, whose namesake founder was the designer of the iconic black turtleneck worn by Steve Jobs.

iPhone Air Sales Are So Bad That Apple's Delaying the Next-Generation Version


The thin and light iPhone Air has sold so poorly that Apple has decided to delay the launch of the next-generation ‌version that was scheduled to come out alongside the iPhone 18 Pro and foldable iPhone in Fall 2026, reports The Information.


Apple has not necessarily canceled the second-generation iPhone Air, but the company is reportedly looking at ways to improve it such as by adding a second rear camera to try to improve its appeal, and a revamped version could appear in Spring 2027 alongside the regular iPhone 18 and iPhone 18e as Apple moves to split up its flagship iPhone launches across the year.

Another report this week claims that the iPhone 16e has similarly "failed" at its $599 price point that marked a significant increase compared to its iPhone SE predecessor, though there have been no reports of a potential delay beyond the rumored Spring 2026 time frame for a follow-up iPhone 17e model.

New HomePod Mini, Apple TV, and AirTag Were Expected This Year — Where Are They?


Rumors of updates for the HomePod mini, Apple TV, and AirTag have regularly pointed toward the middle or end of 2025, but it's looking less and less likely to happen as the time ticks down. While HomePod mini stock in particular is running low at many third-party retailers, the holiday shopping season is already kicking into high gear with Apple even featuring the current model among its top gift ideas.


Delayed releases for HomePod mini and Apple TV updates could be tied to ongoing delays with Apple's revamped Siri that will drive an expansion of the company's smart home platform with new hardware such as a home hub device and cameras, but it's unclear what might be holding up the release of a second-generation AirTag with greater range and other improvements.

Everything New in iOS 26.2 Beta 2


Apple this week provided developers with the second beta of iOS 26.2, which adds a few new features worth knowing about.


Changes since the first beta include a new Liquid Glass look for the Measure app, an option to turn off pinned conversations in the Messages app when in CarPlay, improvements to animations and the Games app, and more.

Apple Launches U.S. Passport Feature on iPhone


Apple has announced that iPhone users can now create a Digital ID in the Apple Wallet app based on information from their U.S. passport.


The Digital ID can be used for domestic air travel at TSA checkpoints in more than 250 airports, and in the future it will be able to provide identity and age verification at select stores, in compatible apps, and on supported websites.

The Digital ID does not, however, fully replace a physical passport, as it can not be used for international travel and border crossing purposes.
